page.title: 16EMPLOYMENT,LONGHOPE
page.content: Longhope has plenty of employment opportunities. Here are some of them.Furniture removals:Trevor Scrivens. Willowstone,Ross Road:manufacturer ofgarden containers and ornaments. Longhope post office, Ian and Maureen Cameron,confectionary, toys,fancy goods and cigarettes. Longhope welding co. specialists in agricultural and industrial buildings. Skip hire:George Read:also sells coal. Midwest joinery; makers of doors, windows, stairs and porches. Ultra-view windows; proprietor Terry Jones. Harold Read haulage contractor. Richard Read, haulage and agent for E.R.F. trucks. The{Farmers Boy Longhope,}free house and restaurant. Live music, barbecues.
